about_the_game:
How far your desire will bring you

One day there is a little witch who want to reunite with her beloved mother that gone missing. She then meet an mysterious merchant who said that she can fulfill her wish, by doing one thing, entering magical book called "Masquaradious". Masquaradious or book of thousand tales is unique book that able to realize a person wish, with the requirement that the person must enter the book and reach the end of the pages. It all sound good and easy to do, but Masquaradious hold many mysteries that is still unknown even to the merchant. So will the little girl dare to take the challenge ?



Features

- Rogue lite adventure with focus on narrative design

- Simple and easy to learn combat mechanic that utilize swapping magical mask with different abilities

- Collect and wield the power of masks by exploring the world or rent and buy it through mysterious merchant

- Each mask have it's own personality inside who can affect the choice you can choose

- Unique NPC and enemies to accompany you inside the ever changing world of Masquaradious
